workData.title: B2C E-Commerce Hyper-Growth
workData.challenge: The brand had a low organic footprint with traffic hovering around 2,000/month, limiting direct sales and brand visibility.
solution: Content Strategy: Developed a Full-Funnel strategy targeting BOFU (Bottom of Funnel) and MOFU (Middle of Funnel) keywords to capture high-intent buyers.
CRO Implementation: Used Microsoft Clarity heatmaps to analyze user behavior, optimizing exit popups and CTA placements.
Technical: Solved critical CMS issues and optimized landing pages for speed and user experience.
workData.result: 650% Traffic Growth (Scaled from 2K to 15K+ monthly) and 3X increase in organic leads within 12 months.

workData.title: Enterprise SaaS Technical Optimization
workData.challenge: A large-scale platform facing challenges with crawlability, indexing efficiency, and content gaps in a competitive SaaS market.
solution: Deep Auditing: Conducted technical audits using Semrush and Screaming Frog to identify and fix "crawl bloat" and indexing errors.
On-Page Overhaul: Optimized meta tags, URL structures, and internal linking to distribute link equity more effectively.
Content Operations: Collaborated with editorial teams to align the content calendar with actual search intent.
workData.result: Improved crawl efficiency and search rankings for high-value commercial keywords, driving consistent organic acquisition.

workData.title: International SEO & Expansion
workData.challenge: Clients needed to expand their organic presence beyond local markets to reach international audiences.
solution: Global Architecture: Implemented International SEO strategies, optimizing subdirectories and subfolders for specific geo-targeting.
Off-Page Strategy: Executed a robust link-building campaign involving guest blogging and infographic submissions to build domain authority.
Performance Tracking: Monitored cross-border KPIs (bounce rates, queries) to refine targeting daily.
workData.result: Successfully established organic visibility in target international regions and increased qualified lead generation.

workData.title: Architecture & Dev-Side SEO
workData.challenge: The website required structural updates to align with Googleâ€™s evolving algorithms and ensure new code deployments didn't hurt rankings.
solution: Dev Collaboration: Partnered directly with development teams to integrate SEO best practices into the code deployment pipeline.
Structural Refinement: Refined URL structures and site architecture to clarify topical relevance for Google bots.
Intent Mapping: Conducted keyword research to realign existing content with current user search intent.
workData.result: Enhanced site health, better alignment with Core Web Vitals, and protection of rankings during code updates.
